general.en_name: Pride of an Elf, High Elf Archer
general.jp_name: 森人の矜持 妖精弓手
general.card_flavor: An elf's arrows hit their mark, even when their eyes are closed!
general.card_ability: 【CONT】 All players cannot play event cards with the same card name as an event card that was played this turn from hand.【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Colorful Adventures" is in your climax area, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to X 《Order》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand. X is equal to the number of cards with  trigger icon that were put into your waiting room by this effect.

abilities.ability1_text: 【CONT】 All players cannot play event cards with the same card name as an event card that was played this turn from hand.
abilities.ability2_text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Colorful Adventures" is in your climax area, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to X 《Order》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand. X is equal to the number of cards with  trigger icon that were put into your waiting room by this effect.
